text_block_list.text:
The middle of Summer Camp. Mejiro Ardan was in good physical 
condition, and training was proceeding favorably. Then one day―

And with that, I look forward to this afternoon. 
 
…Oh?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Ah, you two over there! Are you free tonight? We're planning 
a test of courage tonight, so we're looking for participants!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
Oh, a test of courage? I've heard about them, but I've never 
really had a chance to participate before.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Hey, wait a second! If you ask her so suddenly, it'll trouble 
her you know? I mean… Ardan-senpai, probably wants to take 
care of her physical condition…!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text:
Oh… thank you for your consideration. There aren't any problems 
with my physical condition but… let's see…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
It looks like Mejiro Ardan wants to participate but she doesn't 
want anyone to worry about her. If that's the case―
choice_data_list: <size=41>Let's join. I'll be with you so it'll be okay</size>
<size=41>Let's join. I'll be with you so it'll be okay</size>

text_block_list.text:
!! 
 
Trainer-san…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Got it! But, make sure to take it easy, okay? 
If you need to leave part way through, that's fine!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text: And so, we decided to participate in the test of courage, but―
Boooooo～～～!!!!
text_block_list.name: Ghost Role Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
KYAAAAA―――!!!! 
 
IYAAAA～～～～～!!!!
text_block_list.name: Participants Ahead

text_block_list.text: We could hear loud screams coming from ahead in the darkness

It really does… Fufuu, to say nothing of the excitement. 
Well then, shall we head off too?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Booooo～～～～!!!! ……Oh, Ardan-senpai?! 
S-sorry, are you okay?!
text_block_list.name: Ghost Role Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: Yes, there are no problems. Thank you for being so conscientious.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
I'm～…… gonna～…… curse～… you～…… 
……Senpai～ , please watch your step～.
text_block_list.name: Ghost Role Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. 
You too, be careful of getting bitten by any insects.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
It's good they're worried about Mejiro Ardan's condition but, they're 
not really playing their part as a ghost. Like this, I'm wondering 
if she's enjoying it but―

Fufuu… tests of courage, are really interesting, aren't they? 
Everyone's so lively, I'm glad they invited me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
choice_data_list: You look like you're having fun too
You look like you're having fun too

text_block_list.text: Yes, I'm thrilled. After all―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Following a dark path as a pair…… trying to find ghosts. 
It's much like that play we saw together a little while ago.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Look there, friend. Surely that, is the cursed castle that only 
appears at night! How imposing it seems…
text_block_list.name: Knight A

text_block_list.text: A g-g-g-ghost?!
text_block_list.name: The 2 Knights

text_block_list.text:
Maybe it's because it's dark, but when I think back, it was 
supposed to be a comedy but, it seemed to suddenly head 
in an ominous direction…
choice_data_list: <size=37>I-I'm starting to get a little nervous. Maybe…</size>

text_block_list.text:
…But, there was no response to those words. Mejiro Ardan, 
who was supposed to be next to me, was nowhere to be seen.
I started walking quickly while looking around, but couldn't find her―
-Waaa!!!!
Oh……! Fufuu, fufufufu, what a loud cry.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Fuu… I apologize for that. While we were talking, I thought it 
would be fun to try being the ghost… so I couldn't help myself.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
choice_data_list: <size=43>Next time, I'll be the one to scare you!</size>
<size=43>Next time, I'll be the one to scare you!</size>

text_block_list.text: Oh my, then I look forward to seeing what you can do～
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
That was a very worthwhile event, wasn't it? 
It's unfortunate we couldn't find any ghosts or that castle though.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Fufuu. Things like hiding and letting out a loud voice, 
it was fun seeing all the things you thought of.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Returning to childhood… maybe that's the kind of thing 
they're talking about. When I'm with Trainer-san, it feels 
like I can relax a bit easier.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Fuu…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
choice_data_list: If you're tired, we can take a break.

text_block_list.text: I'm fine, I'm not very tired―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
…… 
 
No, maybe it would be fine to take a little break, right?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
There's training tomorrow after all… what should we do about 
the menu? Today it seems like we're staying up a bit late…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
choice_data_list: <size=41>Tomorrow, I plan to have you train hard.</size>

text_block_list.text: ……! Okay, I understand.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Fufuu, yes. Probably more so than Trainer-san thinks.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
You've accepted that I want to do all that I can. 
…There's someone who understands me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: You have no idea how reassuring that is. That's why, I―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
…Trainer-san, do you remember? 
Before, how you said that it was fine if I wanted to be pampered?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, I'll promise not to push myself too hard when 
you're around, so please, rest assured.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know.
Got it. When you feel like being pampered, let me know.

Trainer-san, you said when I was with you, I could relax 
a bit more, didn't you?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text:
Then… could I borrow your shoulder for a bit… 
For some reason, the sound of the waves is very calming―
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: A gentle sound… I might fall asleep just like this… …Yes, it would probably be fine even if I did.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Looking at "the Me, right now", this must be… the place… I want to be.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
